snippet: The series based on the eight young-adult novels will initially include six to 10 episodes of 10 to 15 minutes each.
abstract: Novelist James Patterson strikes deal with production company Collective Digital Studio for YouTube series based on his best-selling young adult series Maximum Ride.
lead_paragraph: The series based on the eight young-adult novels will initially include six to 10 episodes of 10 to 15 minutes each.

headline.main: James Patterson’s ‘Maximum Ride’ Books to Be a Series on YouTube
headline.print_headline: James Patterson in Deal for YouTube Series
